casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Darrell J. CONWAY. No. D-2970. Supreme Court of the United States May 15, 2017.

Darrell J. Conway, of Babylon, New York, is suspended from the practice of *2155law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
